comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: May I know who made the "bitcent"? I've never even seen this one here  nor can I google it

comments.author: chronicsky
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 21, 2023, 07:25:05 AMMay I know who made the "bitcent"? I've never even seen this one here  nor can I google it Those were made by 'miffman'Here's the thread for more infohttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1537080.0

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Thanks!! I tried searching here but "bitcent" gave me nothing...

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 21, 2023, 09:45:29 AMThanks!! I tried searching here but "bitcent" gave me nothing...you must have not entered it correctly in search - I can search it and see tons of threads all the way back to 2011as for miffman - didnt he call it "BitPiece" not "BitCent"?

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Try googling site:bitcointalk.org "bitcent" and you get 326 hits, but (with exception of this thread, which is a second result) first few pages I tried are all about denomination, not about this particular coin. Even if you try Images - there is one from this auction, but all others are unrelated...Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 21, 2023, 01:21:12 PMyou must have not entered it correctly in search - I can search it and see tons of threads all the way back to 2011

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Once I knew to look for "miffman" it was easy, but thanks ;-)I was just explaining why it is rather hard to find if you don't already know about the maker...Quote from: krogoth on June 21, 2023, 02:27:13 PMTry herehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1537080.0

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 21, 2023, 02:39:09 PMOnce I knew to look for "miffman" it was easy, but thanks ;-)I was just explaining why it is rather hard to find if you don't already know about the maker...Quote from: krogoth on June 21, 2023, 02:27:13 PMTry herehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1537080.0You can also get more information on the coins at the official website: https://bitpiec.es/Might get a virus notification, but should work....

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 21, 2023, 01:57:23 PMTry googling site:bitcointalk.org "bitcent" and you get 326 hits, but (with exception of this thread, which is a second result) first few pages I tried are all about denomination, not about this particular coin. Even if you try Images - there is one from this auction, but all others are unrelated...Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 21, 2023, 01:21:12 PMyou must have not entered it correctly in search - I can search it and see tons of threads all the way back to 2011Because this coin was called “BitPiece” BitCent refers to the denomination - specifically. And you can do the search directly here amd get the same results - no need for google. Sky linked miffmans post directly and krogoth also posted the same link

comments.author: chronicsky
comments.body: I've updated the thread to call it 'bitpiece' rather than 'bitcent'Thanks all for curiosity and infoLet's not go off topic anymore!BTCUMP

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on July 21, 2023, 01:14:22 PMI will kindly let you know that your asking prices are significantly too high. The prices on your casascius products for example would be near all-time highs in terms of BTC and USD. If you incrementally lowered your prices, it would attract more interest. It depends upon your willingness to sell and move the market. I agree.
